thread.title: Edge Hosting Makes Inc. Magazine’s 5000 Fastest Growing Companies List for the 5th Consecutive Year
thread.title_full: Edge Hosting Makes Inc. Magazine’s 5000 Fastest Growing Companies List for the 5th Consecutive Year

author: Naly Yang
title: Edge Hosting Makes Inc. Magazine’s 5000 Fastest Growing Companies List for the 5th Consecutive Year
text:
Edge Hosting, a national leader in providing secure, scalable, and dependable managed hosting services, has been named by Inc. Magazine as one of the 5000 fastest growing companies in the United States. The Inc. 5000 list is a prestigious recognition that ranks American companies based on their revenue growth rate over the last three years. During this time Edge Hosting has grown 114 percent. “We are honored to be named to the Inc. 5000 list for the fifth consecutive year” said Vlad Friedman, Chief Executive Officer at Edge Hosting. “This recognition is an important milestone that reaffirms our efforts and aligns with our vision as we continue to grow the business while providing exemplary service and support to those in need of a managed hosting provider.”
Edge Hosting continues to grow at a rapid pace to keep up with customer and market demand. The managed hosting industry as a whole has seen an influx of growth and adoption from companies large and small that see the benefit in utilizing managed hosting providers to work as an extension of their IT team.
“Receiving this honor is a testament to our employees” said Michael Altman, Chief Operating Officer at Edge Hosting. “Their dedication and commitment to providing secure, scalable and dependable managed cloud hosting solutions while providing the highest level of support has allowed us to sustain this high level of growth. Without them, none of this would be possible.”
The complete list of Inc. Magazine’s 5000 fastest growing companies in the United States can be found at http://www.inc.com/inc5000 . Here you can view more details on each company that made the list and view rankings by region or industry.
About Edge Hosting
Edge Hosting is a national provider of secure managed hosting offering secure, scalable and dependable solutions for cloud, hybrid, dedicated, cluster and colocation. Businesses of all kinds entrust their data with Edge Hosting because they deliver 100% uptime, provide a dedicated U.S. based tech-support team with 24/7/365 monitoring and line-by-line pricing. Edge Hosting also offers secure compliance hosting which include PCI, SSAE 16, HIPAA and FedRAMP. For more information about making the switch to Edge Hosting, please visit http://www.edgehosting.com
